title: ATTEMPTING TO RECONNECT WITH 60ms
body: Basically the first 10 to 15 minutes of a game I get this attempting to reconnect problem about 4 times a game and always have between 60 to 70 ms. I dont understand what is causing this issue and its really frustrating ( i demoted from b1 to b5 ) because of this.

replies.body: Your situation sounds really frustrating, I highly recommend sticking to customs for now.  Just until this is resolved and to prevent any more penalties!  You might have some unstable connection that's causing you to get kicked off from the game server, so my suggestion would be to go through every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities.  Test it out in a custom, and you should be set.
